definition: to breathe/to suck in/to absorb/to inhale

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: There is a ceiling light or other lamps in the bedroom, too.
sentences.chinese: 臥室裏天花板上有吸頂燈，其它地方也有燈。

sentences.english: Yes. Can you tell me the price of that ceiling lamp ?
sentences.chinese: 嗯。那盞吸頂燈的價格是多少？

sentences.english: Can you tell me the price of that ceiling lamp?
sentences.chinese: 你能告訴那盞吸頂燈的價格嗎？

sentences.english: "Yahoo" Shopping is the best place to comparison shop " roof.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎購物是最好的地方比較吸頂燈店。

sentences.english: In other laboratories, we suggest use the one fixed directly to the ceiling, if the height of the ceiling permits.
sentences.chinese: 其他實驗室，如果高度允許，我們建議採用吸頂燈。

sentences.english: Main body lamp can combine droplight of palace lantern form with unit or absorb dome light.
sentences.chinese: 主體燈可用單元組合宮燈形吊燈或吸頂燈。
